    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean fallingEdgeCaught()
      Checks if there has been a falling edge by getting the sensor distance readings and comparing them with previous ones, if the biggest distance came after the smallest one, then a falling edge has been detected
      void findFallingEdge()
      this method finds the alpha and beta for the falling edges, and updates the odometer.
      void findRisingEdge()
      this method finds the alpha and beta for the rising edges, and updates the odometer.
      void lastNValueAdd(double value)
      adding new distance to the array, removes old values to make space
      void lastNValueFind()
      method sets the biggest distance and the smallest distance sensed, and their time in the array
      void localize()
      This is the meain method for localization.
      boolean risingEdgeCaught()
      Checks if there has been a falling edge by getting the sensor distance readings and comparing them with previous ones, if the biggest distance came before the smallest one, then a rising edge has been detected

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public void localize()
        This is the meain method for localization. it sends the localization type to its corresponding method.

      • findFallingEdge

        public void findFallingEdge()
        this method finds the alpha and beta for the falling edges, and updates the odometer. It rotates the robot clockwise until it senses an edg, then counter clockwise till it seses another edge and records alpha and beta and sends them to updating oodmeter method

      • fallingEdgeCaught

        public boolean fallingEdgeCaught()
        Checks if there has been a falling edge by getting the sensor distance readings and comparing them with previous ones, if the biggest distance came after the smallest one, then a falling edge has been detected

      • findRisingEdge

        public void findRisingEdge()
        this method finds the alpha and beta for the rising edges, and updates the odometer. It rotates the robot clockwise until it senses an edg, then counter clockwise till it seses another edge and records alpha and beta and sends them to updating oodmeter method

      • risingEdgeCaught

        public boolean risingEdgeCaught()
        Checks if there has been a falling edge by getting the sensor distance readings and comparing them with previous ones, if the biggest distance came before the smallest one, then a rising edge has been detected

      • lastNValueFind

        public void lastNValueFind()
        method sets the biggest distance and the smallest distance sensed, and their time in the array

      • lastNValueAdd

        public void lastNValueAdd(double value)
        adding new distance to the array, removes old values to make space
